roleset.name: cancer originating in tissue that lines inner and outer anatomical surfaces

role.descr: specific part of organ, if in addition to :ARG2
ARG5: physical manifestation (tumor/mass references; also carcinoma when it points to the physical mass entity)

example.text: history of a resected stage IV sigmoid carcinoma
example.amr: (h / history-01 :ARG2 (c / carcinoma-01 :ARG2 (a3 / anatomical-site :primary + :name (n4 / name :op1 "sigmoid")) :ARG1-of (r2 / resect-01) :ARG1-of (s4 / stage-02 :ARG2 (a4 / ajcc-entity-91 :ARG2 4))
